about_the_game:
RenewEd3D is an interactive software designed to enhance Renewable Energy Education (REE) through Non-Immersive Virtual Reality. It integrates images, text explanations, voice narration, animations, and quizzes to facilitate learning. The software is bilingual, offering narration in both English and Malay to assist students, especially in pronunciation of scientific terms. Students explore the content, engaging with different modules and answering quizzes at the end of each session. Its goal is to raise awareness of renewable energy in an engaging and immersive way.

The gameplay in RenewEd3D revolves around an exploration of renewable energy concepts through a series of themed levels. Here's a breakdown of how the gameplay is structured:

1. Level Exploration:

Students navigate through different levels, each designed to present a new aspect of renewable energy education. The levels are structured to encourage active learning and exploration:

  • Level 1: The Beginning

  • Level 2: Energy Crisis

  • Level 3: Inspiration

  • Level 4: Exploration

  • Level 5: New Hope

2. Interaction and Learning:

  • Virtual Interactions: Students explore various renewable energy systems (such as wind, solar, hydro, etc.) in virtual environments. These environments are designed to mimic real-world scenarios, allowing players to interact with energy systems, solve energy-related challenges, and make decisions that affect the outcome of their virtual energy projects.

  • Quizzes and Challenges: At the end of each level, students face a quiz or challenge that tests their understanding of the concepts covered. The quizzes are integrated into the gameplay, ensuring that students apply what they’ve learned and reinforce key concepts through interactive feedback.

  • Rewards and Progression: As players complete quizzes and challenges, they earn points or rewards, unlocking new levels and gaining access to more complex content.

3. Mode Selection (Individual vs. Group Mode):

  • Individual Mode: In this mode, each player works independently to explore the content, complete challenges, and track their own progress. Scores and certificates are generated based on individual performance.

  • Group Mode: In Group Mode, players can collaborate with others, working as a team to solve challenges, explore energy systems, and discuss concepts together. The group mode tracks the collective performance of the group, fostering teamwork and cooperation.

4. Feedback and Certificates:

  • Instant Feedback: Players receive instant feedback on their quiz answers and performance during challenges, helping them to understand where they may need improvement.

  • Certificates: After completing the levels and achieving certain milestones, students are awarded certificates to recognize their learning achievements.

Overall, RenewEd3D combines interactive, educational gameplay with immersive virtual environments to engage students in renewable energy education, encouraging both individual and collaborative learning experiences.

name: RenewEd3D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) Silver J5005
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
